entry.tran: 越野比赛(如赛跑、自行车赛、滑雪赛等)
entry.def: Cross-country is the sport of running, riding, or skiing across open countryside rather than along roads or around a running track.

example.ex: She finished third in the world cross-country championships in Antwerp.
example.tran: 她在安特卫普的世界越野锦标赛上获得了第3名。

entry.tran: 横越全国的;遍及全国的
entry.def: A cross-country journey involves less important roads or railway lines, or takes you from one side of a country to the other.

example.tran: 遍及全国的铁路服务网络

example.ex: The group made a 13-concert cross-country tour, including a stop in New York.
example.tran: 该乐队举行了13场全国巡回演唱会，其中包括在纽约的一站。

means.word_mean: 1. from one side of a country to the other;
2. moving across open country rather than following tracks or roads;
